description: A very bitter medicinal herb. It can be used to revive a Pokémon that has fainted. It also fully restores the Pokémon’s max HP.
A spray-type medicine for treating wounds. It can be used to restore 20 HP to a Pokémon.
A spray-type medicine for treating wounds. It can be used to restore 60 HP to a Pokémon.
A spray-type medicine for treating wounds. It can be used to restore 120 HP to a Pokémon.
A spray-type medicine for treating wounds. It can be used to fully restore the max HP of a Pokémon.
A medicine that can be used to fully restore the max HP of a Pokémon and cure any status conditions it may have.
A medicine that can be used to revive a Pokémon that has fainted. It also restores half the Pokémon's max HP.
A spray-type medicine for treating poisoning. It can be used to lift the effects of being poisoned from a Pokémon.
A medicine that can be used to restore 10 PP to a single move that a Pokémon knows.
A medicine that can be used to fully restore the max PP of a single move that a Pokémon knows.
A medicine that can be used to restore 10 PP to all four moves that a Pokémon knows.
A medicine that can be used to fully restore the max PP of all four moves that a Pokémon knows.
A spray-type medicine to wake the sleeping. It can be used to rouse a Pokémon from the clutches of sleep.
A spray-type medicine for treating burns. It can be used to cure a Pokémon suffering from a burn.
A very bitter medicinal powder. It can be used to restore 60 HP to a Pokémon.
A very bitter medicinal root. It can be used to restore 120 HP to a Pokémon.
Water with high mineral content. It can be used to restore 30 HP to a Pokémon.
A spray-type medicine that is broadly effective. It can be used to cure any status condition a Pokémon may have.
A very bitter medicinal powder. It can be used to cure any status condition a Pokémon may have.
A spray-type medicine for treating freezing. It can be used to thaw out a Pokémon that has been frozen solid.
A very sweet and refreshing drink. It can be used to restore 70 HP to a Pokémon.
A bottle of highly nutritious milk. It can be used to restore 100 HP to a Pokémon.
A spray-type medicine for treating paralysis. It can be used to free a Pokémon that has been paralyzed.
A highly carbonated soda drink. It can be used to restore 50 HP to a Pokémon.
A medicine that can be used to revive a Pokémon that has fainted. It also fully restores the Pokémon’s max HP.
